page.title: 01AREA SUMMARY
page.content: We live in{East Anglia.}We are about two and a half hours away from{London, the capital city.We are half an hour away from the East Coast.The soil is very dark in colour and very rich and crops grow well in it. The land is very flat.There is not a lot of woodland and most of the land is used as farmland.There are very few cattle or sheep.This area is famous for its vegetable and fruit growing.Produce from this area is taken all over the country to be sold.One of the fruits grown is the strawberry and one of the most common vegetables grown is the lettuce. Although there are many modern machines to help the farmer,many jobs are still done by hand and you can often see men and women hoeing or weeding in the fields.
